duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and sustain secure, resilient, and highly available Kubernetes clusters to support mission critical operations.
Recommend tools and capabilities based on research of the current environment and knowledge of various on premise, cloud-based, and hybrid resources.
Manage and deploy applications in an air-gapped environment.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams and communicate technical ideas and deliver briefings.
Identify and build cloud-based solutions to help customers meet their evolving needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
Certified Kubernetes Application Developer (CKAD), Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA), or Certified Kubernetes Security (CKS) Certification
